post_content.text: You will say this passage in the way that I have declared to you: with ease of tongue, not with a voice, as many of our Comedians do; it would be better then to give my verses to the Pregonero to say them. Do not stain like that, stabbing the air: moderation in everything; since even in the torrent, the storm, and better said, the hurricane of the passions, that temperance that makes the expression soft and elegant must be preserved.

title.text: This is an awesome english post!
